Package com.example.qr_quest

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ItemClickListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item in a RecyclerView is clicked.
    LeaderboardPointsAdapter.OnItemClickListener
    Interface for handling item clicks in the RecyclerView.
    LeaderboardQRCollectedAdapter.OnItemClickListener  
    QRDatabase.QRExistsCallback
    The interface for the callback method to be called when checking if a QR exists in the database.
    UserDatabase.RegistrationCallback
    The interface for the callback method to be called when user registration is successful.
    UserDatabase.UserExistsCallback
    The interface for the callback method to be called when checking if a user exists in the database.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddPhotoActivity
    This class is an activity for opening the device camera to add a photo.
    Avatar
    This class is used to create an avatar and avatar name based on a given QR code hash.
    CameraActivity
    This class is responsible for scanning QR codes using the user's device camera.
    Comment
    This class represents a comment made by a user on a QR code.
    CommentAdapter
    This class is the adapter for the Comment class and extends from the RecyclerView.Adapter class.
    CustomShowInfoWindowAdapter
    This class is used to create a custom InfoWindow for the markers on the map.
    GeoLocation
    This class defines a GeoLocation of the user which contains city, latitude and longitude of the user.
    GeoLocationFragment
    This Class is used to create a dialog fragment which is used to add comment and geolocation of the scanned QR.
    HomeActivity
    Class responsible for navigating to and between home, leaderboard, profile, camera, and maps fragments.
    HomeFragment
    Class that represents the fragment for the home page.
    Leaderboard
    The Leaderboard class manages the data of the leaderboard.
    LeaderboardDatabase  
    LeaderboardFragment
    This class represents the fragment for the leaderboard page.
    LeaderboardPointsAdapter
    This class is an adapter for displaying the leaderboard sorted by points.
    LeaderboardQRCollectedAdapter
    This class is responsible for adapting the data set of User objects to a RecyclerView that displays a leaderboard of users based on the number of QR codes they have collected.
    LeaderboardTopQRAdapter
    Adapter class for the RecyclerView that displays the top QR codes on the leaderboard.
    MainActivity
    MainActivity class.
    MapsFragment
    This class defines the google map and add a custom marker which points to the qr code scanned in user geolocation vicinity
    ProfileFragment
    Class that represents the fragment for the profile page.
    QR
    QR class represents a QR code and stores its content, hash value, score, and avatar.
    QRActivity
    QRActivity displays the scanned QR code image and a back button.
    QRDatabase
    This class is used to handle the Firebase Cloud Firestore database operations related to QR codes.
    QRDialogFragment
    Class is used to create the QRDialogFragment which shows information about the QRmarker clicked on the map
    QRFragment
    Class is used to create QRFragment which ask the user to add photo for QRcode.
    RegisterActivity
    Class responsible for registering a new user
    ScannedUserAdapter
    Adapter for the RecyclerView that displays the list of scanned users.
    ScannedUserAdapter.ViewHolder
    ViewHolder class for the ScannedUserAdapter.
    User
    The User class represents a user in the QR Quest game.
    UserActivity
    Class to display user profile and wallet information which implements ItemClickListener
    UserDatabase
    This class is used to handle the Firebase Cloud Firestore database operations related to Users It allows to add and query Users, as well as to check if a specific User already exists in the database and QR codes scanned by them.
    WalletAdapter
    An adapter class for binding an array of wallet objects to a RecyclerView.
